title: PSA: You can click on Thresh's Lantern to be pulled to him.
body:
Title.

Don't blame Thresh for your deaths when he lanterns you and you don't take it.

replies.body: Depends on where he lanterns. And if he couldve actually fought instead of running like a bitch.

I remember dying once as i tried to escape using Thresh's lantern. I still had flash but thought i could save it. I spammed clicked the lantern and it never work, too many people and minions were clumped over it.

Or missing a kill as you accidentaly click on the lantern while chasing someone.
i call bs, thresh lanturn is only good for picking up souls and making the enemy think u have a teammate in the bush you accidentally threw the lanturn to
